name.ja: <ruby>群<rt>む</rt></ruby>れをなす<ruby>昆虫人間<rt>ベーシック・インセクト</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: If you have an EARTH Attribute Insect Type monster with 2000 DEF in your Graveyard, send 1 other monster from your hand or field to the Graveyard.

effect.en: Add 1 EARTH Attribute Insect Type monster with 2000 DEF from your Graveyard to your hand. If you added "Double Cannon Armor" by this effect, you can destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field.
